summary: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.
cast: Alex Palmer|Bindu De Stoppani|Jukka Hiltunen|David Schneider|Cillian Murphy|Toby Sedgwick|Naomie Harris|Noah Huntley|Christopher Dunne|Emma Hitching|Alexander Delamere|Kim McGarrity|Brendan Gleeson|Megan Burns|Justin Hackney|Luke Mably|Stuart McQuarrie|Ricci Harnett|Leo Bill|Junior Laniyan|Ray Panthaki|Christopher Eccleston|Sanjay Rambaruth|Marvin Campbell|Adrian Christopher|Richard Dwyer|Nick Ewans|Terry John|Paul Kasey|Sebastian Knapp|Nicholas James Lewis|Jenni Lush|Tristan Matthiae|Jeffrey Rann|Joelle Simpson|Al Stokes|Steen Young|Danny Boyle
title: 28 días después
